project_descr: Support to UN Coordination. UN Coordination Unit / RC Office.

outputs.output_descr: The General Operating Expenses (GOE) will be used to cover costs related to the coordination activities and can also be used to complement staffing costs, including short term consultancy fees

This Agreement will be implemented under the overall guidance of the UN Resident Coordinator in Tajikistan with administrative support from UNDP, substantive support of a Human Rights Advisor (L-4) and Administrative Assistant (GS-4), and with additional substantive human rights support from OHCHR Regional Office in Central Asia and HQ in Geneva as requested and required.
donor_name: OFFICE OF THE HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR HUMA
